results.title: Asia Morning Briefing: BTC Demand Cools While “Crypto Capital is Getting More Selective,” OKX’s Gracie Lin Warns
results.description: With BTC demand cooling and profit-taking accelerating, investors are rotating into ether and a handful of resilient plays while retail “altseason” fades.

results.title: Ozak AI Presale Volume Rises 80% in 7 Days as Token Price Hits $0.005
results.description: Ozak AI ($OZ) presale volume surged 80% in seven days, selling over 158 million tokens and raising nearly $2 million; token now at $0.005 in Stage 4.

results.title: Why Crypto is Down Today? Bitcoin Bearish Shift, CLARITY Act Momentum, and Tether’s New US Adviser
results.description: Retail traders turned ultra bearish as Bitcoin dipped below $113K; Senator Tim Scott pushes CLARITY Act, and Tether hires former White House Crypto Council director Bo Hines.

results.title: China Considering Yuan-Backed Stablecoins to Boost Global Currency Usage
results.description: China may endorse yuan-backed stablecoins to internationalize its currency; plan includes rollout via Hong Kong and Shanghai, with regulatory guidance under review.

results.title: Major Crackdown Freezes Over $300 Million in Cryptocurrency Stolen from Scams
results.description: Law enforcement and crypto firms froze over $300 million in assets linked to scams; T3 FCU initiative and operations like Atlas and Avalanche targeted fraud in 14 countries.

results.title: Ethereum Price Hits New All-Time High Above $4,880 Amid Crypto Market Rally
results.description: Ethereum price hits $4,880 (or around $4,885) after signals of rate cuts and ETF inflows, marking a new all-time high.

results.title: XRP Price Jumps 10% as Six Firms Update Spot XRP ETF Proposals with SEC
results.description: XRP rallies as six firms submit updated spot ETF proposals to the SEC, pushing price up by around 10%.

results.title: BlockDAG's Hybrid Tech Sparks a New Crypto Scarcity Race
results.description: BlockDAG, a hybrid DAG and Proof-of-Work project, has raised over $379 million in its presale—making it one of the largest presale events in crypto history.

results.title: Asia's Wealthy Investors Seek More Crypto in Portfolios
results.description: Wealthy families and family offices in Asia ramp up crypto investment, with some aiming for ~5% of portfolios; campaigns like GENIUS Act and trading activity rising.

results.title: Fed’s Bowman Urges Less ‘Cautious Mindset’ on Crypto
results.description: At the Wyoming Blockchain Symposium, Fed Governor Michelle Bowman urged a more proactive regulatory approach to crypto, blockchain, and AI amidst stablecoin reforms.

results.title: Eric Trump Makes Bitcoin Price Predictions as He Reportedly Gets Ready to Visit Metaplanet
results.description: Eric Trump calls himself a “bitcoin maxi,” forecasts BTC at $175K by year’s end—and Eyes acquisitions via American Bitcoin in Japan and Hong Kong.
